box2D.dynamics.B2ContactFilter

type
class
Implement this class to provide collision filtering. In other words, you can implement this class if you want finer control over contact creation.

Static Variables

b2_defaultFilter : B2ContactFilter

Constructor

new()

Instance Methods

rayCollide(userData : Dynamic, fixture : B2Fixture) : Bool

parameters
userData arbitrary data passed from Raycast or RaycastOne
fixture the fixture that we are testing for filtering
returns
a Boolean, with a value of false indicating that this fixture should be ignored.
see
ShouldCollide()
b2World#Raycast
Return true if the given fixture should be considered for ray intersection. By default, userData is cast as a b2Fixture and collision is resolved according to ShouldCollide

shouldCollide(fixtureA : B2Fixture, fixtureB : B2Fixture) : Bool

Return true if contact calculations should be performed between these two fixtures.
